name: Bot Mods for Minecraft PE
description:
Take control of your Minecraft Worlds!!!!!! Bot Mods allows you to change all hidden settings of your Minecraft World:

- Fill your players Inventory
- Change item parameters and enchantments
- Fly faster then a bullet by changing Flying Speed
- Run Faster then the Flash by changing Walking Speed
- Change Spawn Co-ordinates
- Change XP and Damage settings
- Enable Experimental Game play
- Change weather, make it always day, etc ......
- Disable items like TNT
- Make players invulnerable
- Enable Bonus Chests
- There are too many options to list!!!!!!!!

You can download Amazing worlds from the App Gallery or import worlds you've downloaded from the internet. Or simply create new Worlds.

Get Bot Mods now and take control of your Game!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
